attributes.action: Take the abity for MP's to vote for their own pay rises away from them.
attributes.additional_details: Parluzmrnt need to take responsibility for changes on it's own governance.
attributes.background: MP's pay rises should be awarded in line with all other public sector pay rises and awarded by an independent body.

rejection.details:
MPs are already unable to set their own pay and expenses. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
